definition: the guilty party files the suit/the thief cries thief
lit. ghosts are afraid of evil too/an evil person fears someone even more evil (idiom)

sentences.english: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 我恨恶恶人的会，必不与恶人同坐。

sentences.english: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 我恨恶恶人的会，必不与恶人同坐。

sentences.english: Have I any pleasure at all that the wicked should die?
sentences.chinese: 主耶和华说，恶人死亡，岂是我喜悦的吗。

sentences.english: The Righteous One takes note of the house of the wicked and brings the wicked to ruin.
sentences.chinese: 义人思想恶人的家，知道恶人倾倒，必至灭亡。

sentences.english: The Righteous One takes note of the house of the wicked and brings the wicked to ruin.
sentences.chinese: 义人思想恶人的家，知道恶人倾倒，必至灭亡。

sentences.english: A wise king winnows out the wicked; he drives the threshing wheel over them.
sentences.chinese: 智慧的王，簸散恶人，用碌碡辊轧他们。

sentences.english: Whoever corrects a scoffer wins abuse; whoever rebukes the wicked gets hurt.
sentences.chinese: 指斥亵慢人的必受辱骂，责备恶人的必被玷污。

sentences.english: The blessing of the Lord is upon the head of the just: but iniquity covereth the mouth of the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 上主的祝福在义人头上，灾祸却使恶人哑口无言。

sentences.english: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies or the wicked are cruel.
sentences.chinese: 义人顾惜牲畜的生命主，恶人都是残暴不仁。

sentences.english: Take away the wicked [from] before the king, and his throne shall be established in righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 除去王面前的恶人，国位就靠公义坚立。

sentences.english: When the wicked are in authority, transgression increases, but the righteous will look upon their down fall.
sentences.chinese: 恶人加多，过犯也加多，义人必看见他们跌倒。

sentences.english: I will put a muzzle on my mouth as long as the wicked are in my presence.
sentences.chinese: 恶人在我面前的时候，我要用嚼环勒住我的口。

sentences.english: Shall not the light of the wicked be extinguished, and the flame of his fire not shine?
sentences.chinese: 恶人的光必要熄灭，他的火炎必不发亮。

sentences.english: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 义人见仇敌遭报，就欢喜，要在恶人的血中洗脚。

sentences.english: The righteous is not innocent of the deeds of the wicked
sentences.chinese: 行善守法者在恶人恶行中并非纯洁无邪。

sentences.english: God is a righteous judge, a God who expresses his wrath every day.
sentences.chinese: 神是公义的审判者，又是天天向恶人发怒的神。

definition: lit. strung through and filled with evil (idiom); filled with extreme evil/replete with vice/guilty of monstrous crimes
sb who tries to be on good terms with everyone
evil has its retribution (idiom); to suffer the consequences of one's bad deeds/sow the wind and reap the whirlwind (Hosea 8:7)
